Choate Mental Health and Developmental Center. | image_caption = The Anna State Asylum, built in 1869 in the Kirkbride Plan was a rambling four-story structure, part of which was destroyed in separate incidents, but most of which is still standing as the central complex to the C.L. Choate Mental Health and Developmental Center. | image_flag = | image_seal = Seal of Anna, Illinois.png | image_blank_emblem = | blank_emblem_type = | image_map = File:Union County Illinois Incorporated and Unincorporated areas Anna Highlighted.svg | map_caption = Location of Anna in Union County, Illinois | pushpin_map = USA Illinois#USA | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = United States | subdivision_type1 = State | subdivision_name1 = Illinois | subdivision_type2 = County | subdivision_name2 = Union | established_title = Platted | established_date = | established_title1 = Incorporated | established_date1 = February 16, 1865 | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Imperial | area_total_sq_mi = 3.58 | area_land_sq_mi = 3.56 | area_water_sq_mi = 0.02 | area_total_km2 = 9.27 | area_land_km2 = 9.22 | area_water_km2 = 0.05 | area_footnotes = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_ft = 617 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 4303 | population_as_of = 2020 | population_density_sq_mi = 1209 | population_density_km2 = | timezone1 = CST | utc_offset1 = -6 | timezone1_DST = CDT | utc_offset1_DST = -5 | postal_code_type = ZIP code | postal_code = 62906 | area_code_type = | area_code = 618 | website = | pop_est_as_of = | pop_est_footnotes = | population_est = | blank_name = FIPS code | blank_info = 17-01543 | blank1_name = GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = 2393961 }} Anna is a city in the U.S. state of Illinois. It is in southern tip of Illinois. Its population was 4,303 at the 2020 census. Anna is known for the Anna State Mental Hospital (now called the Choate Mental Health Care Center). Anna was a segregated sundown town a century ago. ==References== Category:Cities in Illinois
title: Anna, Illinois
